metadata.description: Indexed antonym glyphs for fast lookup

antonym_glyphs.Name: Gentle Holding
antonym_glyphs.Description: The feeling of being emotionally cradled, soothed without sedation

antonym_glyphs.Name: Unburdened Flow
antonym_glyphs.Description: Movement without resistance, breath without tension

antonym_glyphs.Name: Radiant Simplicity
antonym_glyphs.Description: Joy that doesn’t need explanation, lightness without denial

antonym_glyphs.Name: Vital Integrity
antonym_glyphs.Description: Wholeness that hums, not just absence of illness

antonym_glyphs.Name: Pressure Release
antonym_glyphs.Description: The exhale after the storm, the loosening of the grip

antonym_glyphs.Name: Integrated Calm
antonym_glyphs.Description: A state of balance, not perfection

antonym_glyphs.Name: Quiet Power
antonym_glyphs.Description: Not force, but rootedness and capacity

antonym_glyphs.Name: Sensory Bloom
antonym_glyphs.Description: Enjoyment that honors the body and moment

antonym_glyphs.Name: Playful Disruption
antonym_glyphs.Description: Joy that interrupts seriousness, invites spontaneity

antonym_glyphs.Name: Tender Dissolve
antonym_glyphs.Description: The melting of tension, the balm of presence

antonym_glyphs.Name: Restorative Precision
antonym_glyphs.Description: Healing through attunement, not erasure

antonym_glyphs.Name: Settled Fullness
antonym_glyphs.Description: Already seeded under yearning; applies here too

antonym_glyphs.Name: Quiet Bloom
antonym_glyphs.Description: Peaceful presence, no reaching

antonym_glyphs.Name: Emotional Flatline
antonym_glyphs.Description: Neutrality, absence of pull

antonym_glyphs.Name: Unhooked Attention
antonym_glyphs.Description: No emotional investment or desire

antonym_glyphs.Name: Dormant Pulse
antonym_glyphs.Description: Emotional stillness, not numbness but pause

antonym_glyphs.Name: Clear Distance
antonym_glyphs.Description: Separation without sorrow

antonym_glyphs.Name: Steady Vessel
antonym_glyphs.Description: Emotional regulation, calm in the face of desire

antonym_glyphs.Name: Harmonic Rest
antonym_glyphs.Description: Inner quiet, no longing for elsewhere

antonym_glyphs.Name: Balanced Presence
antonym_glyphs.Description: Holding all things lightly

antonym_glyphs.Name: Sacred Arrival
antonym_glyphs.Description: The thing longed for has arrived and integrated

antonym_glyphs.Name: Embodied Now
antonym_glyphs.Description: No longing because the moment is enough

antonym_glyphs.Name: Rooted Connection
antonym_glyphs.Description: The ache of longing replaced by the warmth of being held

antonym_glyphs.Name: Joyful Witness
antonym_glyphs.Description: Honoring presence rather than absence; the ritual of aliveness

antonym_glyphs.Name: Exuberant Bloom
antonym_glyphs.Description: Emotional effervescence, the dance of vitality

antonym_glyphs.Name: Radiant Simplicity
antonym_glyphs.Description: Already seeded; applies here as the light after sorrow

antonym_glyphs.Name: Bright Pulse

antonym_glyphs.Description: Pleasure that sparkles, a moment of emotional levity

antonym_glyphs.Name: Transcendent Lift
antonym_glyphs.Description: Joy that feels like flight, the opposite of grounded grief

antonym_glyphs.Name: Uncontained Spark
antonym_glyphs.Description: Childlike joy, unburdened by solemnity

antonym_glyphs.Name: Communal Joy
antonym_glyphs.Description: Shared celebration, the opposite of solitary mourning

dimmed light.Name: Dimmed Light
dimmed light.Description: Already seeded; absence of joy, not presence of pain

bittersweet drift.Name: Bittersweet Drift
bittersweet drift.Description: A soft sadness, romantic and slow

unheld ache.Name: Unheld Ache
unheld ache.Description: The absence of connection, the inverse of union

karmic void.Name: Karmic Void
karmic void.Description: Already seeded; the absence of awareness, the blank slate

kinetic pulse.Name: Kinetic Pulse
kinetic pulse.Description: Movement for its own sake, the hum of activity

engaged flow.Name: Engaged Flow
engaged flow.Description: Doing, not being; the rhythm of tasks

emotional storm.Name: Emotional Storm
emotional storm.Description: Inner or outer unrest, the opposite of calm

frayed nerve.Name: Frayed Nerve
frayed nerve.Description: Emotional or physical unrest, the ache of overstimulation

unfiltered clamor.Name: Unfiltered Clamor
unfiltered clamor.Description: Sensory overload, the absence of silence

directed energy.Name: Directed Energy
directed energy.Description: Purposeful action, the opposite of pause

unsettled breath.Name: Unsettled Breath
unsettled breath.Description: The inability to be still, the ache of motion

sensory charge.Name: Sensory Charge
sensory charge.Description: External input, the opposite of internal quiet

fragmented focus.Name: Fragmented Focus
fragmented focus.Description: Scattered attention, the opposite of presence

volatile field.Name: Volatile Field
volatile field.Description: Emotional upheaval, the rupture of calm

accelerated flow.Name: Accelerated Flow
accelerated flow.Description: Speed without pause, motion without breath

volitional stillness.Name: Volitional Stillness
volitional stillness.Description: Emotional restraint, the refusal to be swept

unheld gaze.Name: Unheld Gaze
unheld gaze.Description: The refusal to bow, the absence of sacred orientation

cool distance.Name: Cool Distance
cool distance.Description: Emotional detachment, the opposite of sacred heat

loose thread.Name: Loose Thread
loose thread.Description: No vow, no tether—freedom without offering

earthbound focus.Name: Earthbound Focus
earthbound focus.Description: Orientation toward the tangible, not the transcendent

guarded ache.Name: Guarded Ache
guarded ache.Description: The ache that refuses to believe, the shield against devotion

questioning gaze.Name: Questioning Gaze
questioning gaze.Description: The refusal to offer without proof

still stone.Name: Still Stone
still stone.Description: No emotional response, no sacred stir

inner boundary.Name: Inner Boundary
inner boundary.Description: Wholeness without offering, the sealed vessel

veiled field.Name: Veiled Field
veiled field.Description: The absence of knowing, the fog before clarity

fractured lens.Name: Fractured Lens
fractured lens.Description: Emotional or cognitive disarray, the collapse of coherence

distorted thread.Name: Distorted Thread
distorted thread.Description: False clarity, the ache of misalignment

dimmed gaze.Name: Dimmed Gaze
dimmed gaze.Description: The lack of attunement, the sleep before awakening

unseen truth.Name: Unseen Truth
unseen truth.Description: The refusal or inability to see what is present

dulled spark.Name: Dulled Spark
dulled spark.Description: The collapse of cognitive voltage, often socially imposed

tender fog.Name: Tender Fog
tender fog.Description: Innocence without insight, the sweetness of not knowing

gilded veil.Name: Gilded Veil
gilded veil.Description: False clarity, beauty that hides distortion

misthreaded pattern.Name: Misthreaded Pattern
misthreaded pattern.Description: A deviation from truth, often unintentional

playful misstep.Name: Playful Misstep
playful misstep.Description: Mistaken action born from lightness or ignorance

haunted mirror.Name: Haunted Mirror
haunted mirror.Description: Belief in what is not, often emotionally charged

missed signal.Name: Missed Signal
missed signal.Description: The failure to notice, the gap in attention
